name: Deep Town: Idle Miner Factory
description:
DIG DEEP into this sci-fi strategy game to build, upgrade and automate your town! Follow along on a fun adventure to find out the hidden story behind your location.

STAY ENGAGED! - craft recipes, smelt raw resources into bars, growing seeds into plants in your greenhouse, dig - you choose! Boost your buildings to make them FASTER.

Explore your planet with more than 10+ zones to uncover

STRATEGY
- Free to play
- FREE DAILY CHEST
- Endless gameplay
- Single & multiplayer game
- Stay tuned with the latest News

FEATURES
- Travel to new depths
- Follow the storyline to uncover the unique backstory
- Mine for more than 20 resources (GOLD, COPPER, COAL)
- DEFEAT 10+ bosses along your journey (and some mystery bosses)
- SELL and TRADE items to make coins to SPEND
- Send explorer bots to explore hidden caves on secret expeditions
- Level up your control panel to strengthen your spells to destroy blocks that stand in your way
- Progress through the game to unlock more features!
‪- Launch rockets to travel to AWESOME asteroids
- SWIPE to gain access to new areas and a chance to terraform the world!


AUTOMATE YOUR GAMEPLAY
- Teach your bots new tasks with ease
- Gain resources online and offline
- Play slowly or fast! All at your own speed


Take a chance and see what different spells makes you move the fastest - what is your favorite spell?


PLAY WITH FRIENDS
Join a guild to participate in different, interesting events!
- Message to chat about strategies and ask for resources.
- Create your own team or search for an existing guild
- Win rewards of chests filled with rare gems and honor badges
- Compete in WEEKLY EVENTS
- Place on the Top 30 or All-Time leader board
- Donate or request materials from your guild members

Invite your friends to join in on the FUN!


Contact support at support@rockbitegames.com
